attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Is it possible to speed the CRB checks up the length of time that employers and employees are waiting is not acceptable. I was unemployed and got a job 6 weeks ago and couldnt start work due to waiting for my CRB check,the jobcenter are giving me grief for not looking for work even though I've explained to them that I have got a job but no start date.The whole situation is totally unacceptable six weeks now and I am still waiting for clearance!!

rejection.details: This is a personal matter unsuitable for a petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
